author: R Hassen
comment: Cool app.  I've had out less than an hour so we'll see if it affects battery life or has any other issues.  This really needs a widget though.  Too tedious to check quickly.  Gear 4 coming so now is the perfect time to get that widget happening!

author: Chris Rea
comment: It's not accurate at all. I cross referenced with other sites and for example it said low tide on 01/16/18 was 1:40pm. But it really was 1:08 pm. I went in and selected beaches listed near here and none were close.

reply.author: AppMosaic
reply.content:
Please read the Disclaimer!
Tide predictions are average values based on astronomical calculations and do not take into account any meteorological events.
Just a change of wind direction may shift the tide by more than 15 minutes.
If you really need a higher accuracy, you should not use an app like this or any of the tide predictions on the Web.

author: Pirate Diving Service
comment: Useless  apk ! Tide at the time does not indicate. You have to Guess actual tide from the tiny graph line.  Ask refund few hours after  purchase but they don't !

reply.author: AppMosaic

author: M Hill
comment: I'd like to see times in 24 hour format. Otherwise a great little app and accurate for my needs

author: Shawn Corbett
comment: How can I switch from 24hr time to 12hr time on the main watch face?

author: music Antici
comment: Pretty good,  Love the android wear app,   requested Feature: Auto-detect the closest location based on the phone's location.
Worked on watch for a while, then stopped.

author: ian coombs
comment: Great app , would love it more if it came as a widget for my samsung gear s3

author: Ian Paul Paul
comment: Great apps I dnt need to open tide tables. I just look on my gear S3. Developer updated my requested tide area in a month. Very useful on our ferry route.

author: Leo Acacio
comment: Good app but coud'nt see ningbo & deep water port (yangshan) in China East Coast.

author: Dan Moran
comment: Love the Gear S2 integration unlike most apps. One gripe, I wish it could determine location on its own. The basis of the app is written. Some UI improvements with better functionality and you've got a killer app.
title: It's great

author: Stephen Tenney
comment: Works as stated. maps are NOT discontinued, locations and information are accurate. Android Wear app works great on Moto 360 Sport, and even includes a Watch Face with tides and digital clock.
title: Great app - Maps are NOT discontinued!

author: Geoff Burke
comment: This Tide Software ONLY predicts for 7 days.  AWFUL, HOW IS ANYONE GOING TO PLAN ANYTHING USING THIS AWFUL PROGRAM.  AND I HAVE TO PAY FOR THIS AWFUL PROGRAM

reply.author: AppMosaic
reply.content:
This is NOT TRUE.
The app shows the tide prediction for one month (one moon cycle). 
Please play the animation. Then you will see that the moon makes a full cycle. You can pause the animation at any time and swipe left / right to see the tide chart of the next days.

comment: Tide heights for Saint John NB Canada are not correct.
title: Nice S3 look generally

author: Henning Teige
comment: Very limited information. Cursor would be helpful to determine level/time with actual values.

author: Brad Engel
comment: Should be able to determine your location to find the right tide

reply.author: AppMosaic
reply.content:
Unfortunately it is a bit more complicated than just taking the GPS position:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tide

author: Rick Cox
comment: It works as advertised. No false statements. It's a quick view of upcoming tides in a visual 'Wave ' format. I'd like to see actual data values displayed with the visual effects. Price is a bit high for what it has to offer.
title: As described

author: Helena Van Leeuwen
comment: Your watch will be out of juice within one hour using this app. Absolute terrible app!

reply.author: AppMosaic
reply.content:
Are you sure that Tide Table Chart is to blame for your Moto360 watch battery problems?
There are many Moto360 users who are using this app without any problems.

author: Paul Burrows
comment: The map doesn't work, says the service has been discontinued.
title: Maps discontinued
